languages.text: "Дому понадобится какое-то время на восстановление, но оставшись без главного Атласа... и своего главного страха — меня — кланы Дома смогут примириться вновь. Быть может, даже найдут способ вернуться на ту злосчастную планету посреди варп-шторма и уничтожить эльдарский камень... Или использовать его силу. Но я все же надеюсь, что Атлас Звездных Путей сгинет вместе с нынешним поколением навигаторов Дома Орселлио. И для нашего... их Дома наступит новая эра".

traits.locale_text: "Дому понадобится какое-то время на восстановление, но оставшись без главного Атласа... и своего главного страха — меня — кланы Дома смогут примириться вновь. Быть может, даже найдут способ вернуться на ту злосчастную планету посреди варп-шторма и уничтожить эльдарский камень... Или использовать его силу. Но я все же надеюсь, что Атлас Звездных Путей сгинет вместе с нынешним поколением Навигаторов Дома Орселлио. И для нашего... их Дома наступит новая эра".

languages.text: "It will take some time for the House to recover, but without the main Atlas... and their greatest fear — me — the House clans will be able to find peace once more. Perhaps they will even find a way to return to that ill-fated planet in the middle of the warp storm and destroy the Aeldari stone... or harness its power. But I still hope that the Starway Atlas will die with the current generation of House Orsellio's Navigators, and that a new era will dawn for our— for their House."
languages.original_text: "Дому понадобится какое-то время на восстановление, но оставшись без главного Атласа... и своего главного страха — меня — кланы Дома смогут примириться вновь. Быть может, даже найдут способ вернуться на ту злосчастную планету посреди варп-шторма и уничтожить эльдарский камень... Или использовать его силу. Но я все же надеюсь, что Атлас Звездных Путей сгинет вместе с нынешним поколением навигаторов Дома Орселлио. И для нашего... их Дома наступит новая эра".

Perhaps they will even find a way to return to that ill-fated planet in the middle of the warp storm and destroy the Aeldari stone... or harness its power. But I still hope that the Starway Atlas will die with the current generation of House Orsellio's Navigators, and that a new era will dawn for our— for their House."

Perhaps they will even find a way to return to that ill-fated planet in the middle of the warp storm and destroy the Aeldari stone... or harness its power. But I still hope that the Starway Atlas will die with the current generation of House Orsellio's Navigators, and that a new era will dawn for our— for their House."

"It will take some time for the House to recover, but without the main Atlas... and their greatest fear — me — the House clans will be able to find peace once more. Perhaps they will even find a way to return to that ill-fated planet in the middle of the warp storm and destroy the Aeldari stone... or harness its power. But I still hope that the Starway Atlas will die with the current generation of House Orsellio's Navigators, and that a new era will dawn for our— for their House."

"It will take some time for the House to recover, but without the main Atlas... and their greatest fear — me — the House clans will be able to find peace once more. Perhaps they will even find a way to return to that ill-fated planet in the middle of the warp storm and destroy the Aeldari stone... or harness its power. But I still hope that the Starway Atlas will die with the current generation of House Orsellio's Navigators, and that a new era will dawn for our— for their House."

languages.text: «La casa tardará un tiempo en recuperarse, pero sin el Atlas principal... y sin su mayor temor, o sea, yo... los clanes podrán hallar de nuevo la paz. Quizá incluso encuentren el camino de regreso a ese malhadado planeta en el corazón de la tormenta de disformidad y destruyan la piedra Aeldari... o descubran cómo controlar su poder. Con todo, espero que el Atlas de las Vías Estelares muera con la actual generación de navegantes de la casa Orsellio, y que ello suponga el amanecer de una nueva era para nuestra... para su casa».
languages.original_text: "It will take some time for the House to recover, but without the main Atlas... and their greatest fear — me — the House clans will be able to find peace once more. Perhaps they will even find a way to return to that ill-fated planet in the middle of the warp storm and destroy the Aeldari stone... or harness its power. But I still hope that the Starway Atlas will die with the current generation of House Orsellio's Navigators, and that a new era will dawn for our— for their House."

traits.locale_text: «La casa tardará un tiempo en recuperarse, pero sin el Atlas principal... y sin su mayor temor, o sea, yo... los clanes podrán hallar de nuevo la paz. Quizá incluso encuentren el camino de regreso a ese malhadado planeta en el corazón de la tormenta de disformidad y destruyan la piedra Aeldari... o descubran cómo controlar su poder. Con todo, espero que el Atlas de las Vías Estelares muera con la actual generación de navegantes de la casa Orsellio, y que ello suponga el amanecer de una nueva era para nuestra... para su casa».

languages.text: 「オーセリオ家が復興するまでしばらく時間を要するでしょうが、メイン・アトラスがなければ…そして、彼らの最大の恐怖である私がいなければ、一族は再び平和を取り戻すことができるでしょう。 もしかしたら、〈歪み〉の嵐の中にある不運な惑星に戻り、アエルダリの石を破壊する方法を見つけるか…その力を利用する方法を見つけるかもしれません。それでも、スターウェイ・アトラスが現在のオーセリオ家の航宙士たちとともに滅び、私たち…いえ、彼らの一族の新しい時代が幕を開けることを願っています」
languages.original_text: "It will take some time for the House to recover, but without the main Atlas... and their greatest fear — me — the House clans will be able to find peace once more. Perhaps they will even find a way to return to that ill-fated planet in the middle of the warp storm and destroy the Aeldari stone... or harness its power. But I still hope that the Starway Atlas will die with the current generation of House Orsellio's Navigators, and that a new era will dawn for our— for their House."

traits.locale_text: 「オーセリオ家が復興するまでしばらく時間を要するでしょうが、メイン・アトラスがなければ…そして、彼らの最大の恐怖である私がいなければ、一族は再び平和を取り戻すことができるでしょう。 もしかしたら、〈歪み〉の嵐の中にある不運な惑星に戻り、アエルダリの石を破壊する方法を見つけるか…その力を利用する方法を見つけるかもしれません。それでも、スターウェイ・アトラスが現在のオーセリオ家の航宙士たちとともに滅び、私たち…いえ、彼らの一族の新しい時代が幕を開けることを願っています」

languages.text: “奥赛罗家族需要一段时间才能恢复，但他们无需再面对我与主圣仪的力量，他们最大的恐惧也便消失了，家族分支之间将不再会有纷争。说不定他们甚至能找到方法，重新回到亚空间风暴中那颗不幸的行星，摧毁那颗艾达灵族之石……又或是驾驭它的力量。不过，我仍然衷心希望，群星圣仪能与奥赛罗家族这一代的导航者一起埋葬在过去之中。我们的家族……他们的家族将会迎来新时代的黎明。”
languages.original_text: "It will take some time for the House to recover, but without the main Atlas... and their greatest fear — me — the House clans will be able to find peace once more. Perhaps they will even find a way to return to that ill-fated planet in the middle of the warp storm and destroy the Aeldari stone... or harness its power. But I still hope that the Starway Atlas will die with the current generation of House Orsellio's Navigators, and that a new era will dawn for our— for their House."

traits.locale_text: “奥塞罗家族需要一段时间才能恢复，但他们无需再面对我与主圣仪的力量，他们最大的恐惧也便消失了，家族分支之间将不再会有纷争。说不定他们甚至能找到方法，重新回到亚空间风暴中那颗不幸的行星，摧毁那颗艾达灵族之石……又或是驾驭它的力量。不过，我仍然衷心希望，群星圣仪能与奥塞罗家族这一代的导航者一起埋葬在过去之中。我们的家族……他们的家族将会迎来新时代的黎明。”

languages.text: « La maison aura besoin d'un certain temps pour se remettre, mais sans l'Atlas principal... et leur plus grande crainte, c'est-à-dire moi-même, les clans vont pouvoir retrouver la paix. Peut-être parviendront-ils même à retourner sur cette infortunée planète au cœur de la tempête Warp et à détruire la pierre des Aeldaris... ou à maîtriser sa puissance. Toutefois, j'espère toujours que l'Atlas des étoiles périra avec la génération actuelle de navigateurs Orsellio et qu'une nouvelle aube se lèvera sur notre... sur leur maison. »
languages.original_text: "It will take some time for the House to recover, but without the main Atlas... and their greatest fear — me — the House clans will be able to find peace once more. Perhaps they will even find a way to return to that ill-fated planet in the middle of the warp storm and destroy the Aeldari stone... or harness its power. But I still hope that the Starway Atlas will die with the current generation of House Orsellio's Navigators, and that a new era will dawn for our— for their House."

traits.locale_text: « La maison aura besoin d'un certain temps pour se remettre, mais sans l'Atlas principal... et leur plus grande crainte, c'est-à-dire moi-même, les clans vont pouvoir retrouver la paix. Peut-être parviendront-ils même à retourner sur cette infortunée planète au cœur de la tempête du Warp et à détruire la pierre des Aeldaris... ou à maîtriser sa puissance. Toutefois, j'espère toujours que l'Atlas des étoiles périra avec la génération actuelle de navigateurs Orsellio et qu'une nouvelle aube se lèvera sur notre... sur leur maison. »

languages.text: "Es wird eine Weile dauern, bis das Haus sich erholt, doch ohne den Hauptatlas ... und ihre größte Angst, nämlich mich ... werden die Hausclans wieder Frieden finden können. Vielleicht finden sie sogar einen Weg, auf diesen unglückseligen Planeten in der Mitte des Warpsturms zurückzukehren und den Aeldari-Stein zu zerstören ... oder seine Macht zu nutzen. Ich hoffe jedoch noch immer, dass der Atlas der Sternenwege mit der aktuellen Generation der Navigatoren von Haus Orsellio stirbt, und dass eine neue Ära für unser ... für ihr Haus anbricht."
languages.original_text: "It will take some time for the House to recover, but without the main Atlas... and their greatest fear — me — the House clans will be able to find peace once more. Perhaps they will even find a way to return to that ill-fated planet in the middle of the warp storm and destroy the Aeldari stone... or harness its power. But I still hope that the Starway Atlas will die with the current generation of House Orsellio's Navigators, and that a new era will dawn for our— for their House."

Vielleicht finden sie sogar einen Weg, auf diesen unglückseligen Planeten in der Mitte des Warpsturms zurückzukehren und den Aeldari-Stein zu zerstören ... oder seine Macht zu nutzen. Ich hoffe jedoch noch immer, dass der Atlas der Sternenwege mit der aktuellen Generation der Navigatoren von Haus Orsellio stirbt, und dass eine neue Ära für unser ... für ihr Haus anbricht."

languages.original_text: "It will take some time for the House to recover, but without the main Atlas... and their greatest fear — me — the House clans will be able to find peace once more. Perhaps they will even find a way to return to that ill-fated planet in the middle of the warp storm and destroy the Aeldari stone... or harness its power. But I still hope that the Starway Atlas will die with the current generation of House Orsellio's Navigators, and that a new era will dawn for our— for their House."

languages.text: "Hanenin kendine gelmesi biraz zaman alacak. Ana Atlas ve en büyük korkuları, yani ben olmaksızın Hane klanları yeniden huzura erebilecek. Belki öteboyut fırtınasının göbeğindeki o bahtsız gezegene dönüp Aeldari taşını yok etmenin veya gücünden faydalanmanın bir yolunu bile bulurlar. Yine de umuyorum ki mevcut Orsellio Hanesi Rotacılarının nesliyle, Yıldız Yolu Atlası son bulacak ve Hanemiz... Daha doğrusu Haneleri için yeni bir çağ açılacak."
languages.original_text: "It will take some time for the House to recover, but without the main Atlas... and their greatest fear — me — the House clans will be able to find peace once more. Perhaps they will even find a way to return to that ill-fated planet in the middle of the warp storm and destroy the Aeldari stone... or harness its power. But I still hope that the Starway Atlas will die with the current generation of House Orsellio's Navigators, and that a new era will dawn for our— for their House."

traits.locale_text: "Hanenin kendine gelmesi biraz zaman alacak. Ana Atlas ve en büyük korkuları, yani ben, olmaksızın Hane klanları yeniden huzura erebilecek. Belki öteboyut fırtınasının ortasındaki o bahtsız gezegene dönüp Aeldari taşını yok etmenin veya gücünden faydalanmanın bir yolunu bile bulurlar. Yine de umuyorum ki şimdiki Orsellio Hanesi Rotacılarının nesliyle Yıldız Yolu Atlası son bulacak ve bizim... Daha doğrusu onların Hanesi için yeni bir çağ açılacak."
